1199190.name: WREST Demo
1199190.description:
WREST is a sci-fi/horror virtual reality game in which you play Andy Bishop, an engineer who wakes to discover a terrifying mystery unfolding in his home.

In this free to play demo level, you can explore the game world, inspect the items and examine clues. Combat and puzzle mechanics will play a larger part in future levels.

Part narrative experience, part escape room, the WREST universe will expand in 2020 with a full commercial release and a thrilling two-player game mode.

Enter the mystery @WrestVR and stay tuned for updates.
1199190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
